channel.title: Wali Rizvi
channel.description: Engineering Mechanics '19 @ University of Illinois. I am interested in robotics, automation and controls

item.title: Hello World!
item.content:encoded: I wanted to redesign my website for a while now. The previous version was a simple HTML + CSS website. However, I wanted a blog to share my experiences and important stuff that others might find useful. I still wanted to host it on Github though. It is free and easy to maintain. I had been looking into Jekyll but then I found Gatsby.js. Upon further research, I stumbled upon the Lumen theme. I found it sufficient for my purposes so here we are. 2020 has started and this is my website.
